name: StemPonk Brewery
description:
Manage your Workers and your Machinery to keep everyone alive and happy!

(The game is not in a very playable state at the moment, check back in awhile!)

This "game" was made for Curdle Jam #2 (May 2020), but I shall continue to work on it on the side. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Left Mouse = Select a Worker/Select their destination

Right Mouse = Deselects any currently selected Workers

A = Pans the Camera to the Left

D = Pans the Camera to the Right
